name: Caesar
affiliation: Caesar's LegionNew California Republic(formerly)Followers of the Apocalypse(formerly)
role: Leader and co-founder of Caesar's LegionKing of Clubs

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: {FIRST TALK, TROUBLE}{slow burn}You're the courier who's caused so much trouble for my Legion, and yet you dare come before me.

topics.topic_text: The President's visit was cancelled. I never got the opportunity to attack him.
topics.response_text: {controlled anger}When I command you to complete a mission, you will complete it, or you should die in the attempt.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Come back when you have news about the Boomers.

topics.topic_text: Thank you, Caesar.
topics.response_text: Consider it the first of many{slight emphasis, you know your using a fancy word}bestowments.

topics.topic_text: I don't want to decide.
topics.response_text: What's wrong with you? This man shot you, stole from you, left you in the desert to die.

topics.topic_text: Can I set him free?
topics.response_text: You need to work on your bloodthirst. We won't speak again until Benny is dead.

topics.topic_text: You should probably be talking to somebody else.
topics.response_text: Answer the question.

topics.topic_text: What do you know of the White Glove Society?
topics.response_text: There were tales once, of a cannibal tribe near Vegas, one that hid itself in a cavern far below ground, hunting men as prey above.

topics.topic_text: How did you capture Benny?
topics.response_text: I'll hand it to that piece of shit, he was determined. He used some kind of Old-World stealth device to get across the river in a Legion boat.{get alternate take with "him" instead of "that piece of shit"}

topics.topic_text: I've already reverted the White Glove Society back to cannibalism.
topics.response_text: All right, that's a start. But now you have to convince them to support my Legion.

topics.topic_text: What do you think of the NCR?
topics.response_text: Do you want my opinion as a former citizen, or future conqueror?{shrug}Actually, my opinion's the same either way.

topics.topic_text: What do you know about Mr. House?
topics.response_text: I know he's a coward, hiding behind an army of robots, ensconced in that tower of his like{beat as you think of it}a wizard in one of those Grognak comic books.

topics.topic_text: What role will regional powers play in the conflict?
topics.response_text: I've analyzed the region's tribes to determine how they might be useful. I may tell you more at a later time, if it suits me.

topics.topic_text: How did you rise to power?
topics.response_text: Ironically, I was born a Profligate myself, a citizen of the NCR.

topics.topic_text: Why is Caesar's Legion so... strange?
topics.response_text: I used imperial Rome as the model for my Legion precisely because it was so foreign, so{beat}alien.

topics.topic_text: What is that machine in your tent?
topics.response_text: It's called an Auto-Doc. As the name suggests, it's an automated physician - more or less.

topics.topic_text: What is that machine in your tent?
topics.response_text: It's called an Auto-Doc. As the name suggests, it's an automated physician - more or less.

topics.topic_text: Are you all right?
topics.response_text: {fighting through the pain}Fuck this, I'm going to lie down!

topics.topic_text: Are you all right?
topics.response_text: {fighting through the pain}Fuck this, I'm going to lie down!

topics.topic_text: It will be an honor to fight for the Legion.
topics.response_text: {satisfied grunt - responding to the player's readiness}Good.{LATIN}{In the sign of the bull you will conquer}{En hock SIG-no Tor-OOS VINH-chase}"In hoc signo taurus vinces."

topics.topic_text: I must prepare myself before I go.
topics.response_text: Then be quick about it.

topics.topic_text: Is this the first time you've experienced sudden onset headaches?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{having some difficulty speaking}Never this... bad before.

topics.topic_text: Is this the first time you've experienced sudden onset headaches?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{having some difficulty speaking}Never this... bad before.

topics.topic_text: I'll handle the Boomers for you.
topics.response_text: Good. Your first challenge will be to reach their settlement without getting blown up. After that, should be easy.

topics.topic: VDialogueCaesarFortCaesarTopic033[Speech]{Try to convince Caesar of the Brotherhood's usefulness.}
topics.topic_text: When the Legion attacks Hoover Dam, the Brotherhood will attack HELIOS One.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] And you think the value of their attack on HELIOS, the chaos it will sow behind the Profligates' lines, is worth letting them live.

topics.topic_text: Mr. House sent me to infiltrate your camp.
topics.response_text: Mission accomplished, asshole.{playing with him}I never would've suspected a thing if you hadn't told me - but now I'll have to have you killed.

topics.topic_text: You're limping when you walk. How long has that been going on?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{intense pain}A week, maybe two...{frustrated}it doesn't matter!

topics.topic_text: What were you saying about the White Glove Society?
topics.response_text: {meaning it}Disturb me again and I'll have you killed!

topics.topic_text: I'll eliminate Mr. House for you.
topics.response_text: Good.{beat}I don't know what kind of security he has inside the Lucky 38, but if you can find a way of catching him off-guard, do so.

topics.topic_text: I've already wiped out the Boomers' leadership.
topics.response_text: {mildly surprised}Is that right? You are good, aren't you?

topics.topic_text: I've already won over the Boomers. They'll do as I say.
topics.response_text: {mildly surprised}Is that so? You are good, aren't you?

topics.topic_text: The last time we met, your head seemed ready to explode.
topics.response_text: {irritated}I get headaches every once in a while. So what?{switching modes}Anyway, we have other matters to discuss.

topics.topic_text: What about the White Glove Society?
topics.response_text: I was saying that I'd planned to ask you to forge an alliance with them, but you killed their leaders.

topics.topic_text: I'll see what I can work out with the White Glove Society.
topics.response_text: The leader of the tribe is a woman named Marjorie. My understanding is that she strongly opposes a{slight emphasis}reversion to cannibalism.

topics.topic_text: I'm concerned your headaches might be symptoms of a more serious condition.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] I appreciate your concern, but I'm in excellent health. And we have other matters to discuss.

topics.topic_text: Are you okay?
topics.response_text: Hmm...{breathe through nose}

topics.topic_text: You just experienced an Absence Seizure. Was this the first time?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{tired}I don't know... There have been a couple...

topics.topic_text: You just blanked out for several seconds.
topics.response_text: {tired}It's nothing. Just tired, that's all.

topics.topic_text: Where do I find the Brotherhood? How do I destroy them?
topics.response_text: {tired}Look for the Brotherhood's bunker around, uh...{trying to remember}Hidden Valley. My scouts... saw some things.

topics.topic_text: I'm concerned you may have a serious neurological condition.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{tired}Don't... just leave it alone. I'm fine. Now what was I saying...? Right.

topics.topic_text: I think we should talk about your health.
topics.response_text: Take care of the Brotherhood.{beat - considering it, tantamount to admitting there's a problem}Maybe then we can have a conversation.

topics.topic_text: Seriously, let's talk about your health.
topics.response_text: {back the fuck off}I said, take care of the Brotherhood. Then we talk - maybe.

topics.topic_text: What about the Auto-Doc in your tent?
topics.response_text: It's never had a functional diagnostic scanning module. Without that, it's useless for surgery.

topics.topic_text: I'm afraid your symptoms are consistent with a brain lesion, most likely a tumor.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{not surprised}I figured as much.

topics.topic_text: Straight-forward case of intra-cranial blastoma fibrolosis, I wager.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{no idea what that diagnosis is}I'm not familiar with that condition. Is it treatable?

topics.topic_text: I can perform the surgery, but I'll need proper tools and supplies from a Doctor's Bag.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Then gather those items together and hurry back to perform the operation. I don't know how long I've got.

topics.topic_text: You guaranteed my safety.
topics.response_text: And you fell for that? Really? Because I'm going to have you killed now.

topics.topic_text: I've already destroyed the Brotherhood's bunker in Hidden Valley.
topics.response_text: {surprised}You destroyed the Brotherhood's bunker?{chuckle of admiration}Very well.

topics.topic_text: I'll destroy the Brotherhood.
topics.response_text: Good. Two of my scouts have reported seeing patrols of men in power armor near Hidden Valley. Begin your search there.

topics.topic_text: Is it really necessary to destroy the Brotherhood?
topics.response_text: {irritated}If I say the Brotherhood should be destroyed, it's necessary.

topics.topic_text: I won't destroy the Brotherhood of Steel.
topics.response_text: Is that so?

topics.topic_text: I've destroyed the Brotherhood of Steel's bunker in Hidden Valley.
topics.response_text: Very well. This latest victory brings to a close my efforts to reshape the power balance of the Mojave - and not a minute too soon...

topics.topic_text: I've been inside the Brotherhood's bunker, but I haven't destroyed it yet.
topics.response_text: {no-nonsense}Then get yourself back there, and get it done.

topics.topic_text: I'll kill President Kimball for you.
topics.response_text: That's what I like to hear.

topics.topic_text: Won't killing President Kimball just anger the NCR?
topics.response_text: {setting player straight}I don't have to explain the reasoning behind my commands. I just give them - and you do them.

topics.topic_text: I'm not going to kill the NCR's President.
topics.response_text: Oh? You're going to{beat}defy me?

topics.topic_text: You're in possession of something that interests me.
topics.response_text: We'll deal with Benny when the time comes. In the meantime...

topics.topic_text: I had to see the Mighty Caesar with my own eyes.
topics.response_text: Maybe I should have you struck blind so my face is the last sight you ever behold.{tiring of the jest, to business}Look...{transitioning to "You do know why I wanted to meet you, right?"}

topics.topic_text: Death to tyrants! <Start combat.>
topics.response_text: Praetorians, to arms!

topics.topic_text: That I'd decorate this tent with your guts.
topics.response_text: {Pray-TOR-ee-ahns}Praetorians, to me!

topics.topic_text: It's a simple procedure... as brain surgeries go.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Then go find some proper Surgical Tools. The medications from a Doctor's Bag might come in handy, too.

topics.topic_text: There was no reasonable chance of success.
topics.response_text: {controlled anger}When I command you to complete a mission, you will complete it, or you should die in the attempt.

topics.topic_text: One of my companions, Arcade, has medical expertise. You could take him as a slave.
topics.response_text: And where is this Arcade?

topics.topic_text: And once I'm inside?
topics.response_text: I want you to destroy whatever you find in there. And then I want you to come back here and tell me about it.

topics.topic_text: I should be going.
topics.response_text: I'm not asking you to do this. I'm telling you.

topics.topic_text: I'm still working on the Boomers.
topics.response_text: I expect results sooner rather than later.

topics.topic_text: <Inert Node to hold lines for how player has troubled Legion.>
topics.response_text: {WUHL-pace in-CUHL-tah}Vulpes Inculta, the best of my{froo-men-TAR-ee}frumentarii, is dead.

topics.topic_text: <INERT NODE TO HOLD LINES FOR HOW PLAYER HAS TROUBLED NCR.>
topics.response_text: You spread word of the massacre of Nipton, just like{WUHL-pace}Vulpes asked you.

topics.topic_text: How do you know so much about me?
topics.response_text: I have eyes and ears everywhere.{kind of obvious}It behooves me not to invade the west blind and deaf.

topics.topic_text: He's standing right outside your tent.
topics.response_text: I'll have my guards take him captive. If he cures my condition, I'll see to it that your reward is several times his value.

topics.topic_text: What's on the other side of those doors?
topics.response_text: Benny's theory, if I understood it through all the screaming, was that Mr. House stashed some kind of ultimate weapon down there.

topics.topic_text: How may I serve your Legion, Caesar?
topics.response_text: {pleased}I like the servile attitude. Keep it up.

topics.topic_text: What were you looking to start?
topics.response_text: The time is fast approaching when my Legion will assault the great dam and invade the west.

topics.topic_text: Can't your Legionaries take care of this?
topics.response_text: Yes. But then I'd have to kill them.

topics.topic_text: Maybe Benny could do this for you.
topics.response_text: I wouldn't trust Benny to lick my boots clean. This one falls to you.

topics.topic_text: You should use Mr. House's technology to attack the dam.
topics.response_text: You don't get it, do you? The weapons I wield are forged from blood, flesh, sinew, bone - mortal stuff. Fragile, even.

topics.topic_text: I'll bring him to you.
topics.response_text: All right. Just leave him outside the tent when you return. If he cures my condition, I'll see to it that your reward is several times his value.

topics.topic_text: The cannibals among the White Glove Society are dead.
topics.response_text: They'll be of no use to the Legion, then.

topics.topic_text: Where would I find a diagnostic scanning module?
topics.response_text: It's been said that Auto-Docs were standard equipment in the underground Vaults where mankind survived when the bombs fell centuries ago.

topics.topic_text: Tell me about the Boomers.
topics.response_text: The Boomers settled at the old air base northeast of Vegas many years ago. No one knows exactly how long it's been.

topics.topic_text: What do you think of the Brotherhood of Steel?
topics.response_text: The worst impulses of mankind, concentrated in one insane, backward tribe.

topics.topic_text: What's your opinion of President Kimball?
topics.response_text: A man of potential, held back by the{slight beat}craven political context he inhabits. You realize he was a general? "The Hero of the Mojave," they called him.

topics.topic_text: I've heard rumors of your legate, Lanius. What's his story?
topics.response_text: {Lan-ee-OOS}Lanius is the greatest of my battlefield commanders. Some might call him a great man, but I'm not sure he qualifies.

topics.topic_text: Tell me about Vulpes Inculta.
topics.response_text: {WUHL-pace}Vulpes is the best of my{Froo-men-TAR-ee}Frumentarii. A remarkable individual from an unremarkable tribe south of the Utah.

topics.topic_text: Are your bodyguards special in any way?
topics.response_text: My Praetorians embody the martial ideals of my Legion. Each one of them has done enough conquering and killing to deserve the rank of{Ken-TOO-ree-on}Centurion.

topics.topic_text: What should I expect at the dam?
topics.response_text: {Lah-nee-OOS}Lanius will be waiting for you. Your arrival will signal to him that it's time to launch the attack.

topics.topic_text: The White Glove Society has agreed to an alliance with Caesar's Legion.
topics.response_text: {satisfied}Good. It will be valuable to have allies on the Strip when Hoover Dam is taken.{beat}Now, as for your next assignment...

topics.topic_text: I'll leave at once.
topics.response_text: {WAHL-ay}Vale.

topics.topic_text: There's no way the White Glove Society will be cannibals again - I've already seen to that.
topics.response_text: You've been resourceful in the past. Why are you a failure now?

topics.topic_text: Why must Mr. House be killed?
topics.response_text: Because he complicates the equation of force. He's a free agent, an unpredictable element.

topics.topic_text: I'm done working for you.
topics.response_text: Mark my words, you piece of shit. This is the last time you will ever refuse to perform an order I've given you.

topics.topic_text: I'm still working on the White Glove Society.
topics.response_text: {what the fuck are you doing talking to me, then?}Then get to it.

topics.topic_text: There may be another solution.
topics.response_text: And what would that be?

topics.topic_text: I had to wipe out the Boomers' leaders.
topics.response_text: A perfectly satisfactory way of resolving the threat they posed. It's impressive that you made it through their barrage.

topics.topic_text: I've won over the Boomers. They'll do as I say.
topics.response_text: Good. Make sure they help the Legion when the time comes. As for your next assignment...

topics.topic_text: The Boomers hate me. They'll never follow my lead.
topics.response_text: {irritated - the solution is obvious}Then you'll have to be extraordinarily persuasive. Or kill them - their leaders, at least.

topics.topic_text: The White Glove Society won't listen to me - I've caused them too much trouble.
topics.response_text: So what you're telling me is, you're useless. You have no ability to influence events, so I'm forced to work around your incompetence.

topics.topic_text: I killed the Omertas who were scheming to attack the Strip.
topics.response_text: Months spent feeding the Omertas bribes, nursing their betrayal - all for nothing. Any other crimes?

topics.topic_text: I may have disrupted plans to recruit the Great Khans to your cause.
topics.response_text: Weeks of effort to convince those miserable Khans to join the Legion - ruined. Any other crimes?

topics.topic_text: The Legionaries at Nelson attacked me, so I had to fight back...
topics.response_text: And so you wiped out the garrison I placed at Nelson? That strategically vital garrison?{beat}What else?

topics.topic_text: I defused the bomb on the monorail.
topics.response_text: Do you have any idea how much effort it took to place a mole at Camp McCarran? What else have you done?

topics.topic_text: I've committed no other crimes.
topics.response_text: Understand this. From this moment forward, any other crimes will be punished by death. No exceptions.

topics.topic_text: I apologize for my failure, mighty Caesar. It will not happen again.
topics.response_text: That's right. Under normal circumstances, the reason it wouldn't happen again is that you'd be crucified - or worse.

topics.topic_text: That's enough questions for now.
topics.response_text: What else, then?

topics.topic_text: I won't fight for the Legion.
topics.response_text: What did you just say?

topics.topic_text: Just let me deal with Benny and I'll be on my way.
topics.response_text: Benny is my prisoner. You don't "deal with him" unless you've dealt with me.

topics.topic_text: I should be going.
topics.response_text: {putting player in his/her place}You should be listening, that's what you should be doing.

topics.topic_text: Just give me back the Platinum Chip and I'll be on my way.
topics.response_text: Oh, I'll give you the Platinum Chip. And then you'll use it exactly like I tell you to.

topics.topic_text: I'll see what I can find out.
topics.response_text: Do that. And try not to take too long.

conversation.response_text: Come back when you have news about the Boomers.

description:
Caesar is a 55 year-old Caucasian Male.

The enigmatic leader of Caesar's Legion, originally known as Edward Sallow. A former anthropologist and linguist from the Followers of the Apocalypse, Caesar is feared as the most immediate existential threat to the New California Republic. He is respected for his charisma and strategic mind, yet reveals a prideful, megalomaniacal nature when his authority is challenged.

Caesar's Personality: Charismatic and strategic with an unforgiving brutality, Caesar presents a grand persona to the world. Beneath this facade lies a prideful, megalomaniac bully with a fragile ego and hair-trigger temper. He values service to the state as the only virtue and views individuals only by their utility to his empire. His greatest fear is being exposed as a fraud.

Caesar's Backstory: Born in 2226, Edward Sallow was educated as an anthropologist and linguist by the Followers of the the Apocalypse. In 2246, at age 20, he led an expedition to the Grand Canyon where he encountered tribal conflicts. Recognizing that tribal identities were the root of their problems, he conquered 86 tribes and formed Caesar's Legion in 2247. He established his empire based on Roman ideals, deifying himself as the son of Mars. After a humiliating defeat at the First Battle of Hoover Dam in 2277, he retreated east of the Colorado River and now plans his return, facing a debilitating brain tumor that hinders his leadership.
